definition: variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
because/owing to/on account of
to believe/to think/to consider/to feel
to become/to turn into
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
in order to/for the purpose of/so as to
action/conduct/behavior/activity
why?/for what reason?
to rely mainly on/to attach most importance to
for this reason/with regards to this/in this respect/in order to do this/to this end
even more
to think (i.e. to take it to be true that ...) (Usually there is an implication that the notion is mistaken – except when expressing one's own current opinion.)
until/(used in combination with words like 到[dao4] or 至[zhi4] in constructs of the form 到...為止|到...为止)

sentences.chinese: 左外锋，17岁就为曼联初次登场。

sentences.english: When you share a page, you can designate users as viewers or editors.
sentences.chinese: 在共享页面时，您可以将用户指定为查看者或编辑者。

sentences.english: Carnitine is a nutrient that helps the body turn fat into energy.
sentences.chinese: 肉碱是一种营养，帮助人体脂肪转化为能量。

sentences.english: I closed the window. I combed his long, black hair from his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 我关上窗，为他梳理了额头长长的黑发。

sentences.english: Even as Abraham believed God, and it was accounted to him for righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 正如，亚伯拉罕信神，这就算为他的义。

sentences.english: The cost of living figures out at $300。

sentences.chinese: 我为这件事感到真抱歉，鱼啊。

sentences.english: How long would it take to assemble a team for a project like this?
sentences.chinese: 为这样一个计划调集一个小组的人需要多长时间？

sentences.english: It is really a nonclassical communication system.
sentences.chinese: 该系统为一非古典通信系统。

sentences.english: A number of investigators have used the fluorescent-antibody (FA) technique for Salmonella detection.
sentences.chinese: 因此，沙门氏菌检测的荧光抗体技术为能被广范应用。

sentences.english: Pray for the government to halt its campaign of targeting Christians .
sentences.chinese: 祷告政府会停止以基督徒为箭靶的活动。

sentences.english: He was always excited by his life and busy with where it was going.
sentences.chinese: 他总是为他的生活而兴奋，忙着它要去的地方。

sentences.english: I was a Teacher for America Corp member and I now work for TFA.
sentences.chinese: 我是为美国而教的成员，现在为组织工作。

sentences.english: I was a Teacher for America Corp member and I now work for TFA.
sentences.chinese: 我是为美国而教的成员，现在为组织工作。

sentences.english: Mr Charles was elected (the) chairman of the municipal education committee.
sentences.chinese: 查尔斯当选为先生市教育委员会主任委员。

sentences.english: The big bed was specially made for Yao Ming, the giant basketball player.
sentences.chinese: 这张大床是为篮坛巨人姚明特制的。
